title: King Kull
description: The epic fantasy saga of the mighty warrior of Atlantis and ValusiaKULL! As powerful, courageous and awesome as CONAN!After Conan, King Kull is Robert E. Howard's most famous character. Mighty warrior of the fabled realms of Atlantis and Valusia, Kull is one of the most vivid figures in the entire field of heroic fantasy. Thrill to his strange and violent adventures in one the the greatest sagas ever written!Not only did Robert E. Howard excel in pictures of strife and slaughter, but he was almost alone in his ability to create real emotions of spectral fear and dread suspense. - H.P. LovecraftCover illustration by Chris Achilleos
author: Robert E. Howard
